Name: Plushie Squad's Clean Return
Description: After a long journey, the plushie squad is a mess… Let's help them freshen up and get sparkling clean again.
QuestDesc: After a long journey, the plushie squad is a mess… Let's help them freshen up and get sparkling clean again.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now that I think about it, this Plushie Village seems a bit different from the one in Ragunna.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You look around and notice that the Echoes all seem to look rather downhearted.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sensing your concern, Teensy Weensy hurries to point at the tear marks across the Echoes' bodies.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait... Did something happen on your way here? You all look a bit... dirty.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can't understand what you're saying, but I can tell you're all thinking about getting squeaky clean again, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Teensy Weensy nods frantically at you.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hmm... Is there anything we can do to get rid of these stains?

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How about a Tubpup from Ragunna? I remember there were lots of free-roaming Echoes around the Plushie Village in the Garden of the Lost.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll help them search around a bit whenever I find time and go back to Ragunna.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Tubpup seems to be looking for something...

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah, finally! {PlayerName}! I hear you've made it back to the Plushie Village in Ragunna?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You tell Fulmine what happened at the Plushie Village in Septimont.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I see. Perfect, I was just about to ask you a similar favor.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ever since Teensy Weensy and the gang went off to Septimont, those new Echoes were having trouble fitting in.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If you don't mind, {PlayerName}. I'd like you to help guide them through the morph painting's Sonoro Sphere and reach Septimont.

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After all, they could use the extra hands to help set up their new village, right?

Dialogues.Speaker: Fulmine
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll leave this task to you, {PlayerName}. Let me know if you need anything!

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After Fulmine hangs up, Tubpup looks at you, eyes filled with anticipation.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That being said... I've never actually tried going through the morph painting in the village...

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well... Here goes nothing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Echoes seem extremely thrilled to welcome their new friend.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_undefined
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With Tubpup's help, the Echoes are cleaned and shiny again in no time. As music sounds all over Plushie Village.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Nice. That's a lot better!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What's this?

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You received a present from the Echoes.
